name: The Bagger
description:
A top-down stealth puzzle game developed as a part of the course TDDD23 Design and Programming of Computer Games at Linköping University 2018-09-04–2018-10-21.

Contender for the LiU Game Awards at LiU Game Conference (http://liuga.se) on 2018-11-28.

Design, art, animation, programming and sound
by Axel Nordanskog (Axerosh)

Additional sound effects:
"Shotgun sounds" by lensflare8642 https://freesound.org/people/lensflar...
is licensed under CC0 1.0 https://creativecommons.org/publicdom...
